body.p: Mibble is an SNMP MIB parser library for Java. The library can be used to read SNMP MIB files as well as simple ASN.1 files. The library also contains classes for simple handling of the information contained in the MIB file, such as OID:s and types. More detailed information is available in the feature list.
See the Mibble web site for the latest version available.
The documents below are the release notes for Mibble version ():

item.text: Instructions for installing and running Mibble.
List of features supported in this version.
Information about known issues and future improvements.
Acknowledgements of persons and organizations that have contributed to Mibble.
